description.point1: E-commerce application showcasing extensive product range.
description.point2: Orchestrated authentication, shopping cart, and checkout.
description.point3: Created visually appealing and optimized UI by using React.js and JavaScript (Component-Based Architecture).
description.point4: Elevated user experience with Material UI and Bootstrap.
description.point5: Dynamically loaded and presented data from the backend server through REST APIs, ensuring real-time information.
description.point6: Successfully deployed the website on Netlify for easy access.

description.point1: A Website for Converting leads stored in csv file to json
description.point3: Upload CSV file and by using papaparse it is conerted to json format which is displayed in tabular form in which each cell is editable.
description.point5: Successfully deployed the website on Vercel for easy access.

description.point2: Fetching items from an API using Axios and the useEffect React hook, and storing them in useState
description.point3: Added navigation using React Router DOM
description.point4: Includes various pages like Hero Image Page, Login, Register, Product, Cart, and Confirmation Page
description.point5: Added validation for both the Login and Register pages
description.point6: Used a responsive and dynamic grid to display data
description.point7: Added a product counter on the Cart icon in the NavBar when a product is added to the cart
description.point8: The Cart page includes options to increase or decrease quantity, delete a product, apply discounts, and calculate the total
description.point9: Used react-hot-toast to display pop-up success and error messages
description.point10: Used localStorage to store cart data until the order is confirmed
description.point12: Used Framer Motion to add animation and make the app more dynamic
description.point13: Successfully deployed the website on Vercel for easy access

description.point1: A Resturant app to order food

description.point1: Created web pages using HTML and CSS and made them dynamic using JavaScript
description.point2: Improved UX with multi-select filters, image carouselsImplemented conditional rendering of page elements

description.point4: Utilized localStorage to persist user preferences at client-side and facilitated reservation form submission using fetch API.
description.point5: Deployed the website using Netlify/Vercel for Frontend and Render for Backend

description.point1: Created Map container, React Leaflet, and Open Street Map for map functionality. Added Geo markers using custom data.
